flavorText:
"Let those idiot priests tremble! A new era in unlife begins here and now. Oglor, raise the lightning vane!"

name: Rooftop Storm
originalText: You may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for Zombie creature spells you cast.

rulings.text: You must still pay any mandatory additional costs, such as exiling a creature card from your graveyard for Makeshift Mauler.
The mana cost and mana value of the spell are unchanged. Rooftop Storm only changes what you pay.

text: You may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for Zombie creature spells you cast.
